parameters.name: key
parameters.description: a special key sent to the employee’s email

200.description: Check a change password key response (empty)

get.description: Checks a password change key that was sent to the user email

requestBody.description: One of the request types: only login to get recovery key on email or key & a new password to change password

post.description:
Accepts a login and sends the key to change the password to the user email. 
Or it accepts the key and a new password and changes it.

access_token.description: The access token issued by the server

token_type.description: The type of the token issued

expires_in.description: The lifetime in seconds of the access token

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns an access token on success
